mapper.select: SELECT *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(start_lat))*cos(radians(start_long) -radians(#{lng}))+sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(start_lat)))) AS distance FROM talge having date > now() and distance <= 10 ORDER BY distance LIMIT #{liststartsize}, #{listlastsize}

select count(*) from (SELECT *, (6371*acos(cos(radians(#{lat}))*cos(radians(start_lat))*cos(radians(start_long) -radians(#{lng}))+sin(radians(#{lat}))*sin(radians(start_lat)))) AS distance FROM talge having date > now() and distance <= 10 ORDER BY distance LIMIT 0,1000) t

select t.date,t.person,t.start_name,t.goal_name,t.request, t.start_lat,t.start_long,t.start_long,goal_lat,goal_long,t.status, m.nickname,m.gender,m.point,m.phone,m.id from talge t inner join member m where t.num=#{num} and t.sincheng_id = m.id ;
